articles.title: 32 Cheap Versions Of Expensive Products That'll Make You Feel Like You Really Scored
articles.author: Rachelle Yang
articles.summary: This content presents a variety of affordable alternatives to popular high-end products, focusing on clothing, makeup, and accessories available on Amazon. These products are promoted as look-alikes to brands like Skims, Lululemon, Gucci, and Chanel, often offering similar quality and style at a fraction of the price. The content highlights new and updated product offerings, emphasizing budget-friendly options for consumers.

articles.title: üåè Meta's AI bet
articles.author: Francisco Velasquez
articles.summary: Meta is investing $65 billion in AI with ambitious goals, signaling a new focus or potential service in the AI sector. Additionally, Costco is offering a service where a shopper can get paid to taste-test game-day snacks.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25: 3 reasons to upgrade and 3 reasons to wait
articles.author: Jon Gilbert
articles.summary: Samsung is launching the Galaxy S25 series, including the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra. The series will feature AI-powered Bixby, seamless updates, a minimum of 12GB of RAM, and Snapdragon 8 Elite chips. The Galaxy S25 Ultra will have upgraded telephoto and ultrawide lenses, while the series will launch alongside One UI 7.

articles.title: After Having It For A Week, We Never Want To Be Without It: 31 Products Under $20 That Truly Make A Difference
articles.author: Ellie Jane Rudy
articles.summary: Various companies have introduced a range of new products designed to improve daily life. These include faucet extenders, powerful stain removers like The Pink Stuff, bottle emptying kits (Flip It!), exfoliating mitts, Orly Bonder base coat, draft stoppers, medication trackers, peanut butter knives, blind spot mirrors, Black Girl Sunscreen, moisture meters, pet hair scrapers, cradle cap kits, makeup brush cleaners, foot peel booties, AirPods hooks, pet stain and odor eliminators (Rocco & Roxie), shirt-folding boards, document clips, luggage scales, sheet detanglers (Wad-Free), duck spout covers, wood polish (Howard Feed-N-Wax), car escape tools, foot glide, lid organizers, detangling brushes, sound-dampening bumpers, exfoliator (Luv Scrub), and purse-cleaning sticky balls.

articles.title: Auto Class Cars rolls out new MG HS in Qatar
articles.author: Qatar tribune
org: Tribune News Network Doha Auto Class Cars
articles.summary: Auto Class Cars has launched the new MG HS in Qatar, a mid-size SUV featuring updated style, performance, and technology. The new MG HS boasts a range of features including advanced driver assistance systems, powerful engine options (1.5T and 2.0T), and a modern design with LED lighting and dual HD screens. The car is now available at MG Qatar showrooms.

articles.title: Social-media users bowled over by pizza-flavoured cereal
articles.author: Postmedia News
articles.summary: General Mills, in partnership with Totino's, is launching a limited-time pizza-flavored Cinnamon Toast Crunch cereal. The cereal combines the savory flavor of Totino's Pizza Rolls with Cinnamon Toast Crunch's Cinnadust and shape, and comes in a pizza delivery box-like package. The limited-time flavor will be available for free on Cinnamon Toast Crunch's website, with 1,000 boxes available on a first-come, first-serve basis.

articles.title: Marketing, PR exec Kyle Proctor launches Yellow Nunchucks agency
articles.author: Talk Business
articles.summary: Kyle Proctor has launched Yellow Nunchucks, a fractional marketing company in Northwest Arkansas. The company specializes in Fractional CMO services and marketing consulting, aiming to assist businesses of various sizes with scaling and refining their marketing efforts.

articles.title: Farizon SV Launched In Austria: A Strong Start To The New Year In Europe
articles.author: MENA FN
articles.summary: Farizon showcased its new star product, the Farizon SV, at a recent event. The SV model features an innovative design and offers spacious cargo room.

articles.title: Agentic AI's arrival in automotive industry could signal the end of scripted customer service
articles.author: Somshankar Bandyopadhyay
articles.summary: Petromin, in collaboration with Gupshup, has launched PETROMINit!, a Generative AI-powered customer service agent in Saudi Arabia. Built on the Gupshup Conversation Cloud, PETROMINit! offers real-time assistance to customers via WhatsApp in both Arabic and English. This AI agent saw strong early adoption, with nearly half of Petromin Corp's WhatsApp users exploring the AI features in just the first month of its launch.

articles.title: Sony and Bose beware - I tried Technics EAH-AZ100 and they're my new best buds
articles.author: David Snelling
articles.summary: Technics has launched the EAH-AZ100 earbuds, featuring Magnetic Fluid Driver technology miniaturized from their high-end wired buds, active noise cancellation (ANC), and integration with Dolby Atmos and Dolby Head Tracking. The EAH-AZ100 also includes One-touch Conversation Mode and Voice Focus AI for improved call quality. The price of the earbuds is ¬£259.

articles.title: Newman's Own invites more companies to donate 100% of their profits to charities
articles.author: Thalia Beaty
articles.summary: Newman's Own Foundation launched the '100% for Purpose Club', inviting for-profit companies to donate all their profits to social causes. The foundation offers guidance to organizations seeking to adopt this model. Humanitix, an Australian company that donates 100% of event ticket profits, is a founding member.

articles.title: Reviewing Appy Pie AI Builder and Snappy 3.0 IDE: Transforming No-Code App Development
articles.author: ISAAC KAPLAN
articles.summary: Appy Pie has introduced the Appy Pie AI Builder, powered by the Snappy 3.0 IDE, offering advanced design customization, blazing-fast performance, and affordable pricing. The new version includes cutting-edge AI features, enhanced flexibility, and an intuitive interface for building applications. It targets a wide range of users, from beginners to professionals, providing scalability and dependable customer support.

articles.title: New dawn for rural girls: Sangini initiative transforms menstrual health in Jharkhand, Bihar
articles.author: PTI
org: Netarhat Old Boys Association Global Social
articles.summary: The Netarhat Old Boys Association Global Social Responsibility (NOBA GSR) launched the 'Sangini initiative', introducing sanitary napkin vending machines in approximately 675 schools across rural India. The initiative aims to provide affordable and hygienic sanitary pads, reduce absenteeism, and improve health outcomes for girls and women, ultimately eradicating period poverty from Bihar and Jharkhand.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 series comes good on an AI promise eight years in the making
articles.author: John McCann
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 series features an improved Object Eraser, a generative AI feature accessible through the Gallery app. This tool allows users to remove objects and people from photos, intelligently filling in the background. The Object Eraser on the S25 Ultra outperforms Google's Magic Eraser, delivering superior image results.

articles.title: Crushaders Tech Solution Celebrates 11 Years of Innovation and Growth
articles.author: Od Admin
articles.summary: Crushaders Tech Solution celebrated its 11th anniversary by launching a new listing portal. This platform aims to connect local companies with customers, acting as a modern-day yellow page and empowering business owners to market their enterprises.

articles.title: 6 Cheap Aldi Household Essentials To Start Buying Now
articles.author: Crystal Mayer
articles.summary: Aldi offers discounts on several household essentials under its private labels. These include Boulder ultra paper towels comparable to Bounty, Radiance sweeping cloths similar to Swiffer, Huntington Home three-wick candles, Tandil liquid laundry detergent, Willow ultra-strong bath tissue comparable to Charmin, and Boulder gallon storage bags similar to Ziploc. These products provide cheaper alternatives to name-brand options.

articles.title: Aldi's sell-out iconic hairdryer returns in brand-new colours
articles.author: Stephanie Bateman
articles.summary: Aldi is relaunching its Ionic Hairdryer on January 26th with new limited-edition two-toned color options for ¬£14.99. The hairdryer includes concentrator and diffuser attachments, three heat settings, two speeds, and a cool shot function.

articles.title: Aldi's sell-out iconic hairdryer returns in brand-new colours
articles.author: Senior Journalist
articles.summary: Aldi is reintroducing its sell-out Ionic Hairdryer on January 26th with new limited-edition two-toned color options. The hairdryer features concentrator and diffuser attachments, three heat options, two speeds, and a cool shot function, costing ¬£14.99.

articles.title: Live AI on Meta's smart glasses is a solution looking for a problem
articles.author: Victoria Song
articles.summary: Meta has introduced a new "Live AI" feature for Ray-Ban glasses that aims to provide real-time assistance through voice commands, similar to having an AI assistant. The Live AI is designed to understand the user's context and offer help with various tasks, however, the user has to learn how to ask the right questions to get the desired response. Battery life only lasts for 30 minutes, and the feature has trouble differentiating when the user is talking to it versus someone else in the room.

articles.title: Let's Talk Business: Jumping into the World of AI
articles.author: Rob Gilligan
articles.summary: AI-powered tools such as ChatGPT and Intercom enhance customer service by improving interactions. Marketing platforms like HubSpot and Marketo utilize AI to personalize campaigns and optimize content. These tools are aimed at helping businesses of all sizes to streamline operations, improve decision-making, and boost overall performance.

articles.title: Phone you've probably never heard of takes the best photos I've seen ‚Äì but some snaps are too good to be true
articles.author: Jamie Harris
articles.summary: Honor launched the Magic7 Pro, a new Android smartphone with a focus on AI-enhanced photography. The phone features a 50MP main camera, a 200MP telephoto camera, and a 50MP ultra-wide camera, along with a vibrant display and a fast-charging battery. It runs on Android 15 with MagicOS 9.

articles.title: OpenAI launches operator: Autonomous AI agent to simplify online tasks with minimal user involvement
articles.summary: OpenAI launched Operator, an AI tool designed to autonomously complete tasks via web browser, available to ChatGPT Pro users in the US. This AI agent interacts with websites to book reservations, purchase items, or research information using a Computer-Using Agent (CUA) model. Operator is compatible with platforms like DoorDash, Instacart, Uber, and eBay, and includes safety measures to prevent harmful activities and ensure user confirmation for significant transactions.

articles.title: Gadget that 'makes old jumpers look new' has 90,000 5-star reviews
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Philips Fabric Shaver, a lint remover praised for restoring clothes, is available at Amazon for a discounted price of ¬£9.99 (originally ¬£15.99). The shaver features an adjustable height, protector shield and an easy to remove container for shaved lint. It is also available at Argos and Amazon with alternate brands JML and LintAway.

articles.title: Beauty fans turn to free AI tool to build 'fully tailored' skincare routine now 30% off
articles.author: Narin Flanders
articles.summary: Noli, a new beauty brand, has launched an AI-powered platform that creates personalized skincare routines based on a diagnostic quiz and face scan. The platform, which offers discounts on recommended products from brands like CeraVe and La Roche-Posay, identifies over 20 skin concerns and provides up to 3.2 million unique product combinations.

articles.title: Apple Announces New In-App Purchase API
articles.author: Hartley Charlton
articles.summary: The "Advanced Commerce API" has been introduced to address use cases such as apps offering content libraries and creator-led content. This enables users to purchase subscriptions tied to specific creators.

articles.title: Dreame H12 Dual Wet and Dry vacuum cleaner review: Is this the cleaning companion you need?
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Dreame launched the H12 Dual vacuum cleaner in India, priced at ‚Çπ29,999 during the Republic Day sale. It offers both wet and dry cleaning capabilities, featuring a 700mL used water tank and a 900ml fresh water tank, and includes accessories for dry waste pickup. The H12 Dual is powered by 6 x 4,000 mAh batteries, providing a run time of around 35 minutes for wet cleaning and 60 minutes for dry cleaning.

articles.title: Samsung Unpacked 2025 recap: 5 biggest product announcements that you might've missed
articles.author: Sabrina Ortiz
articles.summary: Samsung unveiled the Galaxy S25 series, new Galaxy AI features, and a fresh One UI 7 upgrade during its Unpacked 2025 event. These announcements represent new product and service offerings from the company.

articles.title: Google revamps mobile search URLs for a sleeker appearance
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Google announced a major update to its mobile search results, focusing on simplifying the appearance of URLs for a more user-friendly experience. This redesign presents a cleaner and more streamlined look by removing the breadcrumb element, enhancing readability and usability on mobile devices. The update applies to all languages and regions where Google Search is available on mobile.

articles.title: Phone brand launches new flagship with improved AI capacity
articles.author: Kristofer Purnell
articles.summary: Samsung is launching its new flagship Galaxy S25 series in the Philippines on February 14. The series features the One UI 7, enhanced AI capabilities, Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and a new 50MP ultrawide camera. Pre-ordering is available with prices varying based on storage capacity for the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra models.

articles.title: Dyson and Shark vacuum rival costs ¬£90 and is an absolute hit with shoppers
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced a new cordless vacuum cleaner with two power settings and a suction peak of 30Kpa. The vacuum cleaner is easy to maneuver and comes with a bracket for wall storage. While praised for its performance on flat surfaces, the reviewer notes that battery life can be an issue when used on the higher suction setting.

articles.title: Amazon's 'useful' ¬£25 kitchen gadget with 100,000 reviews that 'makes life so much easier'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: A kitchen gadget is available on Amazon, priced at ¬£24.99. Amazon shoppers have posted over 100,000 reviews, praising its ease of use, especially for individuals with arthritis, and highlighting it as an effective alternative to traditional can openers.

articles.title: Sky Mobile announces pre-order pricing for the hotly-anticipated Samsung S25
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Sky Mobile has announced pre-order deals for Samsung's new S25 series (S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra), starting from ¬£30 a month. The pre-order includes unlimited calls and texts with optional data add-ons, double storage at no extra cost, and a free pair of Samsung Galaxy Buds3 Pro. The S25 Ultra features a new processor, a larger display, and AI-powered software.

articles.title: Tech Talk: A matter of smart operations
articles.author: Times Leader
articles.summary: The new Matter standard aims to improve interoperability among smart home devices from companies like Amazon, Google, Apple, and Samsung. Matter-compatible devices can now seamlessly work with different smart home ecosystems and hubs, offering consumers greater flexibility and choice. Existing smart home hubs from these companies already support the Matter protocol.

articles.title: I constantly got stains on my clothing but one miracle product has changed my life
articles.author: Vita Molyneux
articles.summary: The Tide Pen, a laundry stain remover, effectively eliminates stains with a simple application. The user describes a transformative experience using the product, highlighting its portability and stain-removing capabilities. The Tide Pen has become an essential item, carried everywhere for immediate stain removal.

articles.title: 40 Products For Anyone Who Hates A Cluttered Home
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The Roll Keeper, a woman-owned small business, is offering a hangable T-shirt organizer for efficient storage. Mister Crafter offers a customizable leather cable and charger rollup organizer. Dunn Rustic, based in Nashville, is selling handmade hat organizers with adjustable clips in various sizes and finishes.

articles.title: When AI Promises Speed but Delivers Debugging Hell
articles.author: Nick Savage
articles.summary: Codescribble, a new shared text editor app, has been launched. The app allows real-time collaboration on the same file, similar to Google Docs. It was developed using TypeScript and LLMs, with a focus on rapid deployment, although the development process using LLMs faced some deployment challenges which were eventually fixed.

articles.title: 5 Cost-Effective Advertising Strategies For Startups
articles.author: John Hall
articles.summary: AudioGO, a self-service platform by SiriusXM, enables smaller businesses to access the audio advertising market across streaming music, podcasts, and radio networks. The platform allows users to create ads and build an audience using hyper-local targeting options. This platform is presented as a cost-effective solution for startups with limited advertising budgets.

articles.title: New Tesla Model Y Juniper Brings Choice: One Pricey And Loaded, One Cheap
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Tesla introduced the Model Y Long Range AWD Launch Series edition. The current Model Y remains available at a lower price.

articles.title: DigitalOcean Expands Hatch Program with New AI & ML Startup Benefits
articles.author: Web Hosting Talk
articles.summary: DigitalOcean has expanded the benefits for its Hatch program. The Hatch program, which initially launched in 2016, aims to equip startups with tools and support. This initiative is intended to help startups turn innovative ideas into scalable businesses.
